aboutText: This tool is designed to provide you with random lottery number combinations for various games. Our goal is to offer a simple, fast, and user-friendly experience. We are constantly working to improve our generator and add new features. Thank you for using our service!
howToUseText: Using the generator is easy. Just click the 'Generate' button to get a new set of lottery numbers. You can also choose to include a bonus number by checking the 'Include Bonus Number' checkbox. To copy the numbers, click the 'Copy' button next to each set.
strategySubheading: Choose a strategy to get your personalized lotto numbers.
strategy1Desc: Based on numbers that have appeared most frequently over time.
strategy2Desc: Focuses on 'hot' numbers from the most recent draws.
strategy3Desc: Picks 'cold' numbers that haven't appeared in a long while.
strategy4Desc: Enter your lucky number (1-45) for a custom combination.
